reference.label: FEA Data Reference Model
reference.p: The Federal Enterprise Architecture Data Reference Model, Version 1.0, September 2004. Available from http://xml.gov/documents/completed/DRMv1.pdf. A more recent DRM Version 2.0, 17 November 2005 is available from http://www.whitehouse.gov/omb/assets/egov_docs/DRM_2_0_Final.pdf

reference.label: GJXDM IEPD Guidelines
reference.p: GJXDM Information Exchange Package Documentation Guidelines, Version 1.1, Global XML Structure Task Force (GXSTF), 2 March 2005. Available from http://it.ojp.gov/documents/global_jxdm_IEPD_guidelines_v1_1.pdf

reference.label: ISO 11179-4
reference.p: ISO/IEC 11179-4 Information Technology Metadata Registries (MDR) Part 4: Formulation of Data Definitions Second Edition, 15 July 2004. Available from http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c035346_ISO_IEC_11179-4_2004(E).zip.

reference.label: ISO 11179-5
reference.p: ISO/IEC 11179-5:2005, Information technology Metadata registries (MDR) Part 5: Naming and identification principles. Available from http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c035347_ISO_IEC_11179-5_2005(E).zip.

reference.label: ISO RelaxNG
reference.p: Document Schema Definition Language (DSDL) Part 2: Regular-grammar-based validation RELAX NG, ISO/IEC 19757-2:2008, Second Edition, 15 December 2008. Available from http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c052348_ISO_IEC_19757-2_2008(E).zip. See also http://relaxng.org.

reference.label: ISO Schematron
reference.p: Schema Definition Languages (DSDL) Part 3: Rule-based validation Schematron, ISO/IEC 19757-3:2006(E), First Edition, 1 June 2006. Available from http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c040833_ISO_IEC_19757-3_2006(E).zip.

reference.label: Logical Entity Exchange Specifications
reference.p: Logical Entity Exchange Specifications, Version 4.0, 27 July 2011. Available from http://130.207.211.107/content/downloads.

reference.label: NIEM BIEC
reference.p: Business Information Exchange Components (BIEC), Version 1.0, NIEM Technical Architecture Committee (NTAC), March 2011. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/guidance/business-information-exchange-components/1.0/.

reference.label: NIEM Conformance
reference.p: NIEM Conformance, Version 1.0, NIEM Technical Architecture Committee (NTAC), 15 September 2008. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/specification/conformance/1.0/.

reference.label: NIEM Conformance Target Attribute Specification
reference.p: NIEM Conformance Target Attribute Specification, Version 1.0, NIEM Technical Architecture Committee (NTAC), 15 January 2013. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/specification/conformance-target-attribute/1.0/.

reference.label: NIEM Concept of Operations
reference.p: NIEM Concept of Operations, Version 0.5, NIEM Program Management Office, 9 January 2007. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/guidance/concept-of-operations/.

reference.label: NIEM Domain Update Specification
reference.p: NIEM Domain Update Specification, Version 1.0, NIEM Technical Architecture Committee (NTAC), 5 November 2010. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/specification/domain-update/1.0/.

reference.label: NIEM High-Level Tool Architecture
reference.p: NIEM High-Level Tool Architecture, Version 1.1, NIEM Technical Architecture Committee, 1 December 2008. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/specification/high-level-tool-architecture/1.1/.

reference.label: NIEM High-Level Version Architecture
reference.p: NIEM High Level Version Architecture (HLVA), Version 1.0, NIEM Technical Architecture Committee, 2008. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/specification/high-level-version-architecture/1.0/.

reference.label: NIEM IEPD Requirements
reference.p: Requirements for a National Information Exchange Model (NIEM) Information Exchange Package Documentation (IEPD) Specification, Version 2.1, June 2006. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/guidance/iepd-requirements/2.1/.

reference.label: NIEM Implementation Guidance
reference.p: NIEM Implementation Guide, NIEM Program Management Office. Available from https://www.niem.gov/program-managers/Pages/implementation-guide.aspx.

reference.label: NIEM Introduction
reference.p: Introduction to the National Information Exchange Model (NIEM), Version 0.3, NIEM Program Management Office, 12 February 2007. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/guidance/introduction/.

reference.label: NIEM MPD Specification
reference.p: NIEM Model Package Description (MPD) Specification, Version 3.0, NIEM Technical Architecture Committee (NTAC), day month [TBD] 2014. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/specification/model-package-description/3.0/.

reference.label: NIEM NDR
reference.p: NIEM Naming and Design Rules (NDR), Version 3.0, NIEM Technical Architecture Committee (NTAC), 31 October 2008. Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/specification/naming-and-design-rules/3.0/.

reference.label: NIEM SSGT
reference.p: NIEM Schema Subset Generation Tool (SSGT). Available from http://tools.niem.gov/niemtools/ssgt/index.iepd.

reference.label: NIEM User Guide
reference.p: NIEM User Guide, Volume 1, U.S. Department of Justice, Office of Justice Programs, (date unknown). Available from http://reference.niem.gov/niem/guidance/user-guide/vol1/.

reference.label: XML Catalogs
reference.p: XML Catalogs, Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards (OASIS) Standard v1.1, 7 October 2005. Available from https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/download.php/14809/std-entity-xml-catalogs-1.1.html.

reference.label: Principles of Data Integration
reference.p: Principles of Data Integration, AnHai Doan, Alon Halevy, and Xachary Ives, Morgan Kaufmann, 25 June 2012.

reference.label: RFC2119 Key Words
reference.p: Bradner, S., Key words for use in RFCs to Indicate Requirement Levels, IETF RFC 2119, March 1997. Available from http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2119.txt.

reference.label: RFC3986 URI
reference.p: Berners-Lee, T., et al., Uniform Resource Identifier (URI): Generic Syntax, Request for Comments 3986, Network Working Group, January 2005. Available from http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986.
Efficient XML Interchange (EXI) Format, Version 1.0, W3C Recommendation, 10 March 2011. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/2011/REC-exi-20110310/.
Extensible Markup Language (XML), Version 1.0, Fifth Edition, W3C Recommendation 26 November 2008. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/2008/REC-xml-20081126/.
XML Information Set, Second Edition, W3C Recommendation 4 February 2004. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/2004/REC-xml-infoset-20040204/.
Namespaces in XML, Second Edition, World Wide Web Consortium 16 August 2006. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-names-20060816/.

reference.label: W3C XML Schema Datatypes
reference.p: XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes, Second Edition, W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/2004/REC-xmlschema-2-20041028/.

reference.label: W3C XML Schema Structures
reference.p: XML Schema Part 1: Structures, Second Edition, W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/2004/REC-xmlschema-1-20041028/.

reference.label: W3C XPath 2.0
reference.p: XML Path Language (XPath) 2.0, Second Edition, W3C Recommendation 14 December 2010. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/2010/REC-xpath20-20101214/.

reference.label: XSLT v1.0
reference.p: XSL Transformations (XSLT), Version 1.0, W3C Recommendation 16 November 1999. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xslt-19991116.

reference.label: XSLT v2.0
reference.p: XSL Transformations (XSLT), Version 2.0, W3C Recommendation 23 January 2007. Available from http://www.w3.org/TR/2007/REC-xslt20-20070123/.
